attributes.action: increase the taxes for cars so people are encouraged to ride their bikes/decreasepollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the tax on cars should be increased because then the drivers will not be relying on them as much as the tax will be too high to pay. This encourages being green and would help get rid of global warming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
